TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, but it kills you.

i wish there was a mod to have wipeout-(the futuristic racing game) in ksp.

Granted, but it is implemented in such a terrible way that you wish it out of existence after five seconds of play.

I wish I could light fires with impunity.

Granted. You can now light fires, but it uses up your impunity. You are punished.

I wish for beans.

granted. they are radioactive and deadly.

i wish for Kso for mac.

(I assume you mean KSP)

Granted. It's locked down by apple's policy so you can't install any mods whatsoever. Oh, and did I mention the $200 price tag?

I wish for more computing power for myself.
i mean kerbal shuttle orbiter

I wish for more computing power for myself.

Granted. You are interrogated by the government for having alien-like technology, and they steal your computing power! You are left with a Toshiba laptop from 2006.

I wish for a Red Iron Crown.

Granted. You are given a rusty crown, cut your scalp with it, and die from tetanus.

I wish for Techno Trousers.

Granted. But you get irritated by the repetitive music pretty fast and later you wish that you've been careful what you wish for.

I wish to be the richest person on Wall Street.

Granted. Wall Street is evacuated due to an earthquake, but you are the only person left behind.

I wish for a fully operational portal gun.

Granted. It makes holes in walls, using giant orbs of death-energy.

I wish for death-energy to be a thing.

Granted. Everytime somebody dies it leads to an explosive release of this death energy that pushes things with a lot of force. This naturally causes chain reactions, one of which has wiped your city in about 10 seconds.

I wish to have perfect cold-blooded logic.

Granted. Your blood is now full of sharp silicon chips.

I wish for an ice staff.

Granted. The ice staff makes you the ice king,but suddenly it spews ice at you,making you frozen in ice.

I wish that i had infinite french toast.

Edited January 26, 2015 by Guest
Oops,Never mind...

Granted, but the french toast absorbs the entire universe due to its infinitessimalism.

I wish that I could get a response!

Granted. Hello!

I wish that I could teleport to a theme park,undetected.

Granted. You teleport to Disneyworld. However, you're so undetectable that the ride operators never see you in line and you consistently get passed over to enter anything except for "It's a Small World"

I wish this snowstorm would go away soon.

Granted, but you get hit by 100 super tornadoes instead...

I wish I had something to wish for...

Granted, you wish for a anvil. One instantly appears over you.

I wish for something that will ruin my life forever. Ha! What are you going to do now?

Black hole opens briefly below you and sucks only you in...

I wish I had a pet dragon.

Granted, it's very fond of you but it eats all your belongings and you have to clean up its huge piles of poop twice a day.

I wish all the people were very kind and generous to me.

Granted. Insteadof giving you things they throw things at you! (Not sure if it this counts:P)

I wish we could harness the full powah of the sun.

Granted, but the power transforms your body into porridge.

I wish for the Voyager movie (Nassault)

This item isn't available in your country.

I wish for a trillion Deutsche Mark.

Granted. You get a trillion microscopic marks of German flags on a piece of paper.

I wish Wi-Fi on my tablet wasn't so unpredictable.
